faqs.question: What Modules Are Covered in Oracle Fusion Manufacturing Training?
faqs.answer: Our Oracle Fusion Manufacturing Training covers key modules including Business Units, Manufacturing Configuration, Master Data Management, Production Execution, Cost Management, Change Order Management, Inventory Management, and Quality Management. For a complete syllabus, please refer to our detailed course brochure.

faqs.question: What Is the Course Schedule?
faqs.answer: Training sessions are conducted from Monday to Saturday, with 1-hour live sessions each day. This structure ensures regular engagement and hands-on experience with Oracle Fusion Manufacturing Cloud.

faqs.question: Are Weekend Batches Available?
faqs.answer: Currently, we do not offer weekend-only batches. All live sessions are scheduled from Monday to Saturday to maintain consistency in learning.

faqs.question: Do You Offer Self-Paced Learning?
faqs.answer: Yes, we provide recorded sessions for self-paced learners. Please note that real-time doubt clarification is not included in this mode.

faqs.question: Do You Provide Internship Opportunities?
faqs.answer: Yes! Internship opportunities are offered based on performance in mock evaluations. These provide practical experience with Oracle Fusion Manufacturing tools and real-world projects.

faqs.question: Can I Download the Training Videos?
faqs.answer: Downloads are not available through the web portal, but you’ll have secure access to all session recordings for 1 year. However, if you’re using our mobile learning app, you can download up to 20 videos to watch offline—ideal for learning without internet access.

faqs.question: Can I Enroll in a Single Manufacturing Module Instead of the Full Course?
faqs.answer: No, the Oracle Fusion Manufacturing Training is delivered as a comprehensive course package. Individual modules are not offered separately.

faqs.question: Do You Provide Resume Preparation Support?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer complete resume building assistance tailored to Oracle Fusion Manufacturing roles, highlighting your training and project experience.

faqs.question: Is a Laptop or Desktop Required for Practice?
faqs.answer: Yes, access to a laptop or desktop is necessary for working with the Oracle Cloud instance during training.

faqs.question: Are There Any Prerequisites for This Training?
faqs.answer: No prior technical background is required. The course begins with the basics, making it suitable for students and professionals from any field. A basic understanding of manufacturing or supply chain processes is helpful but not mandatory.

faqs.question: Do You Teach from the Basics?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. We start from foundational topics and progress to advanced features in Oracle Fusion Manufacturing Cloud, ideal for both freshers and experienced professionals.

faqs.question: Do You Provide Job Placement Assistance?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer full job placement support, including mock interviews, resume optimization, and career guidance. Our network includes top employers hiring for Oracle Fusion SCM and Manufacturing roles.

faqs.question: Do You Offer Oracle Fusion Manufacturing Certification Support?
faqs.answer: Yes, we support your certification journey by providing sample questions, study tips, and expert mentoring to help you clear Oracle Fusion Manufacturing Cloud certification exams.

faqs.question: Do You Provide Training Recordings and Study Materials?
faqs.answer: Yes, all training recordings will be available for 1 year. Soft-copy materials, including detailed steps and screenshots, are provided for each module.

faqs.question: Do You Provide Interview Questions and Mock Support?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer module-specific interview questions and conduct mock interview sessions to boost your confidence for real-time Oracle Fusion Manufacturing job roles.

faqs.question: Do You Provide Instance Access for Practice?
faqs.answer: Yes, 5 months of Oracle Cloud instance access is included, allowing you to gain real-time hands-on experience without any software installation.

faqs.question: Can I Retake the Course?
faqs.answer: Yes, your 1-year membership allows you to attend multiple batches of our Oracle Fusion Manufacturing training at no additional cost.

faqs.question: Will I Get a Course Completion Certificate?
faqs.answer: Yes, after completing the course successfully, you will receive an official Course Completion Certificate in Oracle Fusion Manufacturing Cloud.

faqs.question: Is Coding Knowledge Required?
faqs.answer: No, this is a non-coding focused course. The training is centered on the functional and technical configuration aspects of Oracle Fusion Manufacturing.

faqs.question: Is One-on-One Training Available?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer personalized 1-on-1 training sessions on request. Please note that pricing is different from regular group batches.
